snippet: With his new album, “18 Months,” Calvin Harris is after bona fide pop stardom in the United States, but giving up some of the usual influence of a producer in dance music.
abstract: Jon Caramanica notes that Scottish DJ Calvin Harris appears to be seeking American pop success by using high-profile collaborations with well-known singers in his latest album, 18 Months.
lead_paragraph: With his new album, “18 Months,” Calvin Harris is after bona fide pop stardom in the United States, but giving up some of the usual influence of a producer in dance music.

headline.print_headline: A D.J. Seeks a New Spotlight in Pop
headline.seo: The D.J. Calvin Harris Releases New Album, ‘18 Months’
headline.main: A D.J. Seeks a New Spotlight in Pop
